events.content: Help me plan a trip to Boston from Tallahassee from October 10-17. I’d like to spend one night in Amherst, NH to visit some friends, and a couple of nights in the White Mountains to see the fall foliage.
I prefer boutique hotels or b&bs, can spend about $200/night. I’d like to go on an easy hike, but avoid tourist traps. Flights will be to and from Boston.
I’m open to Cambridge. I’d prefer North Conway. As for dining recs, I’d like to go where the locals go.
